Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: numGroups
Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Returns number of groups for this user.

Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: getGroupAt(_:)
Structs/UserListItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Returns the users group at a given index.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV6up.name: update(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV6up.abstract: Update the current login user before the login expires. Logins can be set to automatically expire after a time period.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV5lo.name: login(_:_:_:_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV5lo.abstract: Login as a user. This will logout a current user.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV5ow.name: owner
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV5ow.abstract: Returns the owner user id for the current run.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9lo.name: loginHash
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9lo.abstract: Returns the login hash for the current login session.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV4da.name: data
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV4da.abstract: Returns the custom data value of the current login user or nil if there is no login.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV2id.name: id
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV2id.abstract: Returns the unique id of the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV4na.name: name
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV4na.abstract: Returns the unique name of the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV6ac.name: active
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV6ac.abstract: Returns true if the user is active.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV7ex.name: expired
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV7ex.abstract: Returns true if the login of the user has expired.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9la.name: lastLogin
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9la.abstract: Returns the time of the last login of the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV4in.name: info
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV4in.abstract: Returns the UserID and GroupID for the current user and group owning the user.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV8ha.name: hasGroup(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV8ha.abstract: Check if the user is a member of the group.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV8ha.name: hasGroup(_:)
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV8ha.abstract: Check if the current user is a member of the group.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9li.name: listOwned(_:order:chunkLimit:withGroups:)
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9li.abstract: Get the list of users owned by a user.

Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9li.name: listOwned(_:order:chunkLimit:withGroups:)
Structs/User.html#/s:9libappudo4UserV9li.abstract: Get the list of users owned by a group.

Structs/UserID.html#/s:9libappudo6UserID.name: rawValue
Structs/UserID.html#/s:9libappudo6UserID.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique user id.

Structs/UserID.html#/s:9libappudo6UserID.name: value
Structs/UserID.html#/s:9libappudo6UserID.abstract: Returns the user for the unique user id.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.name: string
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.abstract: Return the query result value as String.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.name: int
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.abstract: Return a query result value as Int.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.name: int32
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.abstract: Return a query result value as Int32.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.name: float
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.abstract: Return a query result value as single precision.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.name: double
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.abstract: Return a query result value as double precision.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.name: bool
Structs/SQLQryValue.html#/s:9libappudo11.abstract: Return a query result value as Bool.

Structs/SQLQryErrCode.html#/s:9libappudo.name: errMsg
Structs/SQLQryErrCode.html#/s:9libappudo.abstract: Returns the String message for the error.

Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:9libappudo10S.name: value
Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:9libappudo10S.abstract: Get the value of the setting as String.

Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:9libappudo10S.name: isValid
Structs/SettingVar.html#/s:9libappudo10S.abstract: Check if there was an error parsing the setting.

Structs/Run.html#/s:9libappudo3RunV6tree.name: treeId
Structs/Run.html#/s:9libappudo3RunV6tree.abstract: Returns the unique tree id of the run.

Structs/Run.html#/s:9libappudo3RunV4root.name: root
Structs/Run.html#/s:9libappudo3RunV4root.abstract: Get the root of the run in the run tree. The root can be used to get a menu for that part or the run tree.

Structs/RunID.html#/s:9libappudo5RunIDV8.name: rawValue
Structs/RunID.html#/s:9libappudo5RunIDV8.abstract: Returns the unique id of the run.

Structs/PDF/PDFCreateFlags.html.name: PDFCreateFlags
Structs/PDF/PDFCreateFlags.html.abstract: PDFCreateFlags contains the parts used to generate a unique key for the cache entry.

Structs/PDF.html#/s:9libappudo3PDFV6crea.name: create(_:_:flags:scale:dimension:margin:pageRange:pageURL:)
Structs/PDF.html#/s:9libappudo3PDFV6crea.abstract: Create a pdf file from a page link.

Structs/PDF.html#/s:9libappudo3PDFV13PDF.name: PDFSignDigest
Structs/PDF.html#/s:9libappudo3PDFV13PDF.abstract: PDFSignDigest contains the algorithm used to sign a PDF.

Structs/PDF/PDFSignFlags.html.name: PDFSignFlags
Structs/PDF/PDFSignFlags.html.abstract: PDFSignFlags contains the parts used to generate a unique key for the cache entry.

Structs/PDF.html#/s:9libappudo3PDFV4sign.name: sign(_:_:_:digest:flags:cert_pass:name:contact:location:reason:)
Structs/PDF.html#/s:9libappudo3PDFV4sign.abstract: Sign a pdf file with a certificate.

Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: numChildren
Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Get the number of children of the MenuItem.

Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: active
Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Returns true if the MenuItem is the item of the current page.

Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: link
Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Returns the Link to the page of the MenuItem.

Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: name
Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Returns the name of the page visible in the run tree.

Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: get(_:_:shift:up:)
Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Get a MenuItem tree with a single page as root.

Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: get(_:_:shift:up:)
Structs/BaseMenuItem.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Get a MenuItem tree with a single page as root.

Structs/Memory.html#/s:9libappudo6Memory.name: used
Structs/Memory.html#/s:9libappudo6Memory.abstract: Returns the used memory of the current run in bytes.

Structs/Memory.html#/s:9libappudo6Memory.name: max
Structs/Memory.html#/s:9libappudo6Memory.abstract: Returns the maximum usable memory of the current run in bytes.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV7he.name: headers
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV7he.abstract: The headers to send with the mail.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV11a.name: attachments
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV11a.abstract: The files to send with the mail.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV4se.name: send(_:_:_:)
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV4se.abstract: Send a mail with a String body.

Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV4se.name: send(_:_:_:)
Structs/Mail.html#/s:9libappudo4MailV4se.abstract: Send a mail with data from a FileItem as body.

Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV5is.name: isRun
Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV5is.abstract: Return true if the link points to a page.

Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV2to.name: to(run:)
Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV2to.abstract: Create a link to a run in the run tree.

Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV2to.name: to(file:_:)
Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV2to.abstract: Create a link to a file accessible by the run.

Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV2to.name: to(url:_:isLocal:)
Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV2to.abstract: Create a link to a custom url.

Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV8to.name: toString(_:)
Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV8to.abstract: Returns the link as a String to print.

Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV5is.name: isSSL
Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV5is.abstract: Returns true if the link points to a target using SSL.

Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV7is.name: isLocal
Structs/Link.html#/s:9libappudo4LinkV7is.abstract: Returns true if the link points to a local target.

Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV6.name: runner
Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV6.abstract: Returns the initial group id for the current run.

Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV2.name: id
Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV2.abstract: Returns the unique id of the group.

Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV6.name: active
Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV6.abstract: Returns true if the group is active.

Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV4.name: info
Structs/Group.html#/s:9libappudo5GroupV4.abstract: Returns the UserID and GroupID for the current user and group owning the group.

Structs/GroupID.html#/s:9libappudo7Group.name: rawValue
Structs/GroupID.html#/s:9libappudo7Group.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique group id.

Structs/FileItem/Flag.html.name: Flag
Structs/FileItem/Flag.html.abstract: Flag contains the mode used to open a file or directory.

Structs/FileItem/RenameFlags.html.name: RenameFlags
Structs/FileItem/RenameFlags.html.abstract: RenameFlags contains the mode used to rename a file or directory.

Structs/FileItem/MKPathFlags.html.name: MKPathFlags
Structs/FileItem/MKPathFlags.html.abstract: MKPathFlags contains the mode used to create a directory path.

Structs/FileItem/Mode.html.name: Mode
Structs/FileItem/Mode.html.abstract: Mode contains the access rights of a file or directory for its user or group owner.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: create_dev(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Create a run device file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: isRoot
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns true if the FileItem is a root directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: isOpen
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns true if the FileItem is an open file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: name
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the name of the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: path
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the full path of the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: stat
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the FileStat holding information about the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: stat_open
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the FileStat holding information about the open file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: getView(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns a view of the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: setMode(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Set the current access mode for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: setOwner(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Set the owning user and group for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: setOwner(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Set the owning user for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: setOwner(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Set the owning group for the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: listDir(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Get a list for the contents of a directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: close()
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Close the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem/AccessMode.html.name: AccessMode
Structs/FileItem/AccessMode.html.abstract: AccessMode contains the access modes of a file or directory to use with access.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: access(_:mode:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns true if the file or directory exists and the current login user has ownership and rights for access.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: seek(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Set or get the current file position.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: open(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Open the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: open(_:_:_:emptyPath:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Open a path relative to the directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: mkpath(_:_:flags:emptyPath:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Create directories relative to the directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: rename(_:_:flags:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Rename the file or directory. The FileItem is updated with an empty path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: link(_:_:hard:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Link the file or directory to a new path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: link_open(_:_:hard:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Link the file or directory to a new path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: copy(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Copy the file to a new path.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: remove(_:outer:nofollow:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Remove the file or directory.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: write(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Write data to the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: append(_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Append data to the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: send(_:_:_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Zero copy data to a FileSeekable target.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: truncate_open(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Truncate the open file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: truncate(_:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Truncate the file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: readAsText(_:offset:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Read the file as String.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: readAsArray(_:offset:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Read the file as ContiguousArray.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: readLink(splitDepth:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Create a file form the symbolic link pointing to the real file.

Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: watch(_:data:)
Structs/FileItem.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Watch for changes on a file.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: isFileNotDir
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns true if the FileItem is a file and not a directory.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: time_latest
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the latest of change and modification time.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: time_access
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the time the file was last read (access time).

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: time_mod
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the time of file’s last content modification. (modification time).

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: time_state
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the time of file’s last meta data change. (change time).

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: uid
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the UserID for the current user owning the file or directory.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: gid
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Returns the GroupID for the current group owning the file or directory.

Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.name: mode
Structs/FileStat.html#/s:9libappudo8File.abstract: Return the access mode for the current user and group owner.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: SEEK_SET
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Use this flag to set the current position.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: SEEK_CUR
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Use this flag to get the current position.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: SEEK_END
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Use this flag to get the maximum position.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: SEEK_DATA
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Use this flag to move the current position to the next data.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.name: SEEK_HOLE
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html#/s:9libappudo1.abstract: Use this flag to move the current position to the next hole.

Structs/AppudoError.html#/s:9libappudo11.name: text
Structs/AppudoError.html#/s:9libappudo11.abstract: Returns the string message for the error.

Structs/Cert.html#/s:9libappudo4CertV2id.name: id
Structs/Cert.html#/s:9libappudo4CertV2id.abstract: Returns the unique id of the cert.

Structs/Cert.html#/s:9libappudo4CertV4na.name: name
Structs/Cert.html#/s:9libappudo4CertV4na.abstract: Returns the unique name of the cert.

Structs/CertID.html#/s:9libappudo6CertID.name: rawValue
Structs/CertID.html#/s:9libappudo6CertID.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique group id.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.name: errorMsg
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.abstract: Returns the error message for a failed async.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.name: isReady
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.abstract: Returns true if the async has finished.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.name: hasError
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.abstract: Returns true if the async has an error.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.name: waitFor()
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.abstract: Block until the async has finished and return the error state.

Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.name: errorValue
Structs/AsyncValue.html#/s:9libappudo10A.abstract: Returns the error value of the async.

Structs/AccountID.html#/s:9libappudo9Acc.name: rawValue
Structs/AccountID.html#/s:9libappudo9Acc.abstract: Returns the raw value of the unique group id.

Structs/AccountID.html.name: AccountID
Structs/AccountID.html.abstract: AccountID holds an account’s unique id. Other APIs can accept AccountIDs.

Structs/ACME.html.name: ACME
Structs/ACME.html.abstract: ACME stands for Automatic Certificate Management Environment and allows to automatically update SSL certificates with an authority like letsencrypt.

Structs/AsyncValue.html.name: AsyncValue
Structs/AsyncValue.html.abstract: AsyncValue is the common return type for async APIs.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo10AsyncTimerV.name: AsyncTimer
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo10AsyncTimerV.abstract: An AsyncTimer can shedule execution of code to a time where at least the specified milliseconds have passed.

Structs/CertID.html.name: CertID
Structs/CertID.html.abstract: CertID holds a certificate’s unique id. Other APIs can accept CertIDs.

Structs/Cert.html.name: Cert
Structs/Cert.html.abstract: Cert contains information for a single certificate.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo6DomainV.name: Domain
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo6DomainV.abstract: For each registered domain there is a property with the domain name in the Domain struct.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo7SettingV.name: Setting
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo7SettingV.abstract: For each registered setting there is a property with the setting name in the Setting struct.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo3DirV.name: Dir
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo3DirV.abstract: For each registered directory there is a property with the directory name in the Dir struct.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo4RoleV.name: Role
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo4RoleV.abstract: For each registered role there is a property with the role name in the Role struct.

Structs/AppudoError.html.name: AppudoError
Structs/AppudoError.html.abstract: AppudoError holds the numeric error values and their string representations.

Structs/ErrorEvent.html.name: ErrorEvent
Structs/ErrorEvent.html.abstract: A run receives ErrorEvent items on errors.

Structs/FileSeekFlag.html.name: FileSeekFlag
Structs/FileSeekFlag.html.abstract: The FileSeekFlag is used for the FileSeekable API.

Structs/WatchFlag.html.name: WatchFlag
Structs/WatchFlag.html.abstract: The WatchFlag is used for the file watch API.

Structs/FileStat.html.name: FileStat
Structs/FileStat.html.abstract: Information about a file like the size or ownership is accessed with a FileStat.

Structs/FileItem.html.name: FileItem
Structs/FileItem.html.abstract: A single file or directory is modified with a FileItem.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo8FileViewV.name: FileView
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo8FileViewV.abstract: The FileView is used to hand over a partial view of a file to other APIs.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo9GroupInfoV.name: GroupInfo
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo9GroupInfoV.abstract: GroupInfo holds the owning user and group of a group.

Structs/GroupID.html.name: GroupID
Structs/GroupID.html.abstract: GroupID holds a group’s unique id. Other APIs can accept GroupIDs to modify group ownership.

Structs/Group.html.name: Group
Structs/Group.html.abstract: Single groups are added, modified or removed with a Group.

Structs/Link.html.name: Link
Structs/Link.html.abstract: Link is used to get and modify http links to different target types.

Structs/Memory.html.name: Memory
Structs/Memory.html.abstract: Memory provides information about the used and maximum memory of the current run.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo6MemVarV.name: MemVar
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo6MemVarV.abstract: Memory variables are accessed and updated with a MemVar.

Structs/BaseMenuItem.html.name: BaseMenuItem
Structs/BaseMenuItem.html.abstract: The BaseMenuItem is used to walk and access the ordered pages of the run tree.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.name: Page
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo4PageV.abstract: A single page run from the run tree is represented by a Page.

Structs/PDF.html.name: PDF
Structs/PDF.html.abstract: PDF is used to create pdf files from pages and to sign pdf files.

Structs/Proc.html.name: Proc
Structs/Proc.html.abstract: Proc provides access to special system files providing system information.

Structs/RunID.html.name: RunID
Structs/RunID.html.abstract: A single run is represented by a RunID.

Structs/Run.html.name: Run
Structs/Run.html.abstract: A single run from the run tree is represented by a Run.

Structs/SettingVar.html.name: SettingVar
Structs/SettingVar.html.abstract: Single setting values are accessed or updated with a SettingVar.

Structs/Socket.html.name: Socket
Structs/Socket.html.abstract: A single connection to a run is managed with a Socket.

Structs/SQLQryErrCode.html.name: SQLQryErrCode
Structs/SQLQryErrCode.html.abstract: SQLQryErrCode contains the error for an SQLQry.

Structs/SQLQryValue.html.name: SQLQryValue
Structs/SQLQryValue.html.abstract: SQLQryValue holds a single SQLQry result value.

Structs/StaticDomain.html.name: StaticDomain
Structs/StaticDomain.html.abstract: Each host of an account is identified by a StaticDomain.

Structs.html#/s:9libappudo8UserInfoV.name: UserInfo
Structs.html#/s:9libappudo8UserInfoV.abstract: UserInfo holds the owning user and group of a user.

Structs/UserID.html.name: UserID
Structs/UserID.html.abstract: UserID holds a user’s unique id. Other APIs can accept UserIDs to modify user ownership.

Structs/User.html.name: User
Structs/User.html.abstract: Single users are added, modified or removed with a User.

Structs/UserListItem.html.name: UserListItem
Structs/UserListItem.html.abstract: UserListItem represents a single item in a UserList.

Structs/WatchEvent.html.name: WatchEvent
Structs/WatchEvent.html.abstract: A run receives WatchEvent when watching a file for changes.

Protocols/FileSendSource.html#/s:9libapp.name: send(_:_:_:)
Protocols/FileSendSource.html#/s:9libapp.abstract: Zero copy data to a FileSeekable target.

Protocols/FileLockable.html#/s:9libappud.name: isLocked(_:_:)
Protocols/FileLockable.html#/s:9libappud.abstract: Check if there is a lock in range.

Protocols/FileLockable.html.name: FileLockable
Protocols/FileLockable.html.abstract: FileLockable represents a lockable file to serialize reads and writes.

Protocols/FileSeekable.html.name: FileSeekable
Protocols/FileSeekable.html.abstract: FileSeekable represents a file that is seekable.

Protocols.html#/s:9libappudo15DataWriteS.name: DataWriteSource
Protocols.html#/s:9libappudo15DataWriteS.abstract: DataWriteSource represents a data item that can be used with the file write APIs.

Protocols/FileSendSource.html.name: FileSendSource
Protocols/FileSendSource.html.abstract: FileSendSource represents a file that supports zero copy.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo2lnopxSgAA10.abstract: Wait until the async has finished. Aka await.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo2lnoixSgAA10.abstract: Wait until the async has finished. Aka await.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo2lqopSbyycF.abstract: Schedule a function or closure to call it later.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo2qgoiSbAA10A.abstract: Schedule a function or closure to call it later when the async has finished.
Schedule a function or closure to call it later when the async has finished.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortA.name: AlphasortASC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortA.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for directory listings with ascending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortD.name: AlphasortDSC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortD.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for directory listings with descending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortA.name: AlphasortASC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortA.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for user listings with ascending alphabetical order.

Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortD.name: AlphasortDSC(a:b:)
Functions.html#/s:9libappudo12AlphasortD.abstract: AlphasortASC is a comparison function for user listings with descending alphabetical order.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: format0
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: A basic format to parse and print Date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: format1
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: A basic format to parse and print Date.

Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.name: fromIntervalSince1970(_:)
Extensions/Date.html#/s:10Foundation4Dat.abstract: Get a Data from a time interval sine 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970.

Enums.html#/s:9libappudo14ErrorEventType.name: ErrorEventType
Enums.html#/s:9libappudo14ErrorEventType.abstract: ErrorEventType holds the different types of error events.

Enums.html#/s:9libappudo15HTTPRequestTyp.name: HTTPRequestType
Enums.html#/s:9libappudo15HTTPRequestTyp.abstract: HTTPRequestType contains the type of a http request.

Enums.html#/s:9libappudo4LangO.name: Lang
Enums.html#/s:9libappudo4LangO.abstract: Lang contains possible values for user languages.

Enums.html#/s:9libappudo8LinkTypeO.name: LinkType
Enums.html#/s:9libappudo8LinkTypeO.abstract: LinkType contains the type of the Link pointing to.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: init(_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Create an SQLQry instance. For security reasons the query string must be statically known at compile time.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: init(schema:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Create an SQLQry instance. For security reasons the query string must be statically known at compile time.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: init(dirty_and_dangerous:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Create an SQLQry instance with a possibly dangerous dynamic String.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: inTransaction
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Returns true if there is an open transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: begin()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Start a new transaction. There must not be an active transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: end()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: End the current transaction. There must be an active transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: rollback()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Rollback the current transaction. There must be an active transaction.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: closeAll()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Close all open query results.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: isPending
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Returns true if the current query has not finished.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: values
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Get and set the values used for the query.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: exec()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Execute the query and receive the results.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: get(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a query result value as SQLQryValue.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: getAsText(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a query result value as String.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: getAsInt(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a query result value as Int.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: getAsInt32(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a query result value as Int32.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: getAsReal(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a query result value as single precision.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: getAsDouble(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a query result value as double precision.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: getAsBool(_:_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a query result value as Bool.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: colName(_:)
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Return a column name of the query result.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: close()
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Close the curret query result.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: nativeMode
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Set to true to use the native mode for the query. In non native mode it is only possible to get result values as String.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: numRows
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Returns the number of rows for the current query result.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: numCols
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Returns the number of columns for the current query result.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: errCode
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Returns the error for the current query.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: hasError
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Returns true if the query has failed.

Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.name: errMsg
Classes/SQLQry.html#/s:9libappudo6SQLQry.abstract: Returns the error message for the current query.

Classes/HTTPClient/HTTPVersion.html.name: HTTPVersion
Classes/HTTPClient/HTTPVersion.html.abstract: HTTPVersion contains the HTTP versions useable with the HTTPClient.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: get(_:_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: POST(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link as a POST request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: GET(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link as a GET request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: DELETE(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get a HTTPClient instance for a link as a DELETE request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: close()
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Close the current connection to the peer.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: connect(_:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Create a keep alive connection to a peer with a link.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: send(_:removeEncoding:updateHeaders:updateCookies:httpVersion:)
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Send an HTTP request to the target with optional body data.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: postFiles
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get and set the files to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: cookies
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get and set the cookies to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: headers
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get and set additional headers to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: encoding
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get and set the encoding to send with the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: isSSL
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Returns true if the target is using the ssl protocol.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: type
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Get and set the request type for the request.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: isPending
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Returns true if the current request has not finished.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: hasError
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Returns true if the request has failed.

Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.name: bodyData
Classes/HTTPClient.html#/s:9libappudo10H.abstract: Returns the body data as an unlinked file.

Classes/Async.html#/s:9libappudo5AsyncC3.name: any()
Classes/Async.html#/s:9libappudo5AsyncC3.abstract: Block until any or all asyncs have finished and return one if any.

Classes/Async.html#/s:9libappudo5AsyncC5.name: later()
Classes/Async.html#/s:9libappudo5AsyncC5.abstract: Run all functions to call later that do not depend on an async.

Classes/Async.html.name: Async
Classes/Async.html.abstract: Most of the APIs of Appudo are async. There are multiple data structures for the async handling.

Classes/UserAsync.html.name: UserAsync
Classes/UserAsync.html.abstract: UserAsync can be used to create custom async functions.

Classes/FileItemList.html.name: FileItemList
Classes/FileItemList.html.abstract: FileItemList is a chunked list representation for directory listings.

Classes/HTTPClient.html.name: HTTPClient
Classes/HTTPClient.html.abstract: HTTPClient is used to transfer data to and from internal or external REST APIs with the http protocol.

Classes/SQLQry.html.name: SQLQry
Classes/SQLQry.html.abstract: SQLQry is used to access database tables registered with the run.

Classes/TimedArray.html.name: TimedArray
Classes/TimedArray.html.abstract: TimedArray is an array like data structure where items are removed when not used within a timeout period.

Classes/UserList.html.name: UserList
Classes/UserList.html.abstract: UserList is a chunked list representation for user listings.
